      protected static java.util.List<java.lang.String> identifiers

      • params

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params
        Query parameters, cannot be null, ex: ?atitle=[title]&firstAuthor=[first_author_lastname] Identifier are also delivered as parameter, with the name of the identifier

      • deserializer

        protected CrossrefDeserializer<T> deserializer
        JSON response deserializer, ex: WorkDeserializer to convert metadata to BiblioItem, it's similar to CrossRef, but possibly enriched with some additional metadata (e.g. PubMed)

        protected java.util.ArrayList<CrossrefRequestListener<T>> listeners
